post:
I put out a call to the hosts here to provide some special deals initially to give me something to tweet about with the @LowEndSpirit twitter account, here is what we got so far.

As for all hosts/service providers here feel free to post anything you want in this thread which will live and die in 48 hours, no rules!.

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/l1J9LUpGQ4TCtzO24/giphy.gif "")


<hr/>

**_Inception Hosting_** - 40% off all SSD cached (London) KVM with 1GB or more on **any** term.

Products Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=27
Coupon Code: 40offssdcachedkvm
**Valid Thru:** March  13, 2020

**Haendler** - At the moment we got a few dedicated server which aren't used, so we decided to sell them to the Community at a low price.
Please note that these offers are extremely strong limited, so it's possible that the deals are gone in a few hours.

Delivery can take up to a week, but mostly we deliver in less than 24h.

**Celeron-J3455-120GBSSD:**

Intel Celeron J3455
8 GB DDR3
120 GB SSD

_For 18 € / month or 170 € / year_


**Celeron-J1900-240GSSD:**

Intel Celeron J1900
8 GB DDR3
240 GB SSD

_For 19 € / month or 180 € / year_


**Celeron-J3455-1TBHDD:**

Intel Celeron J3455
8 GB DDR3
1 TB HDD

_For 20 € / month or 190 € / year_


**I7-4700EQ:**

Intel I7 4700EQ (4 [8] x up to 2,8 GHz)
8 GB DDR3
1 TB HDD

_For 29 € / month or 300 € / year_


**E5-1620_16G:**

Intel Xeon E5-1620 (4 [8] x up to 3,8 GHz)
16 GB DDR3 RegECC
2 x 240 GB SSD

_For 44 € / month or 450 € / year_


For all of these offers:
* 1 IPv4 inclusive
* /64 IPv6 inclusive
* 1 TB Traffic inclusive
* GBit/s connection to our 10G network

All offers are located in the Netherlands and connected to AMS-IX and DE-CIX in Frankfurt (Germany).
To protect our network against DDoS we use Voxility in front for every IP, so your server will be also protected.

To order please contact out Support at helpdesk@haendler.it
